cards.title: Cuccio Milk & Honey Revitalizing Cuticle Oil, 2.5 oz
cards.alt: Cuccio Milk & Honey cuticle oil treatment bottle
cards.desc: Deeply hydrating cuticle oil blends safflower, sunflower and vitamin E to moisturize, repair cracked cuticles, and strengthen thin nails.

cards.title: C CARE Sweet Almond Cuticle Oil for Nails, 2.5 oz
cards.alt: C CARE sweet almond cuticle oil treatment bottle
cards.desc: Nourishing sweet almond oil moisturizes and softens dry cuticles, absorbs without greasy residue, and supports stronger, smoother, naturally glossy nails.

cards.title: Sally Hansen Vitamin E Cuticle & Nail Oil
cards.alt: Sally Hansen vitamin E cuticle and nail oil bottle
cards.desc: Vitamin E enriched formula conditions dry, brittle nails and softens rough cuticles; natural oil complex absorbs quickly to restore flexibility and shine.

cards.title: CND SolarOil Cuticle Oil with Jojoba & Vit E
cards.alt: CND SolarOil jojoba and vitamin E cuticle oil
cards.desc: Lightweight blend of jojoba, sweet almond and vitamin E penetrates deeply to condition skin and nails, reducing brittleness and promoting healthy growth.

cards.title: Blossom Cuticle Oil with Real Flowers — Rose, 0.5 oz
cards.alt: Blossom cuticle oil with real flowers, rose bottle
cards.desc: Hydrating cuticle oil infused with real flowers and essential oils; softens dry skin, conditions nails, and leaves a light rose scent.

cards.title: Nail-Aid Biotin Ultimate Strength Treatment, 0.55 oz
cards.alt: Nail-Aid biotin nail strengthener treatment bottle
cards.desc: Concentrated biotin treatment fortifies weak, peeling nails, dries quickly to a durable clear finish, and builds smoother, harder, longer nails.

cards.title: OPI ProSpa Nail & Cuticle Oil for Dry Hands
cards.alt: OPI ProSpa nail and cuticle oil treatment bottle
cards.desc: Salon-grade oil nourishes dry hands and cuticles, strengthening the nail area for healthy growth; bottle application leaves a moisturized, conditioned finish.

cards.title: Meschett Cuticle Oil Pens, 2-Pack (Peach & Strawberry)
cards.alt: Meschett cuticle oil brush pens, 2 pack set
cards.desc: Portable brush pens make precise application simple; plant-derived oil hydrates cuticles, reduces hangnails, and adds healthy shine in peach and strawberry.

cards.title: L’Occitane Shea Nail & Cuticle Oil, 0.25 oz
cards.alt: L’Occitane shea nail and cuticle oil applicator
cards.desc: Rich shea oil (30%) softens cuticles and conditions nails; targeted applicator delivers quick moisture for healthier-looking hands and stronger nails.

cards.title: Cuticle Oil Pen with Vitamin E — Manicure Helper
cards.alt: Vitamin E cuticle oil pen for manicure care
cards.desc: Convenient brush pen delivers vitamin E enriched oil to moisturize, protect, and strengthen nails and cuticles, extending manicure life with mess-free use.

cards.title: Nail Dehydrator & Primer Kit with Cuticle Oil
cards.alt: Nail dehydrator, primer and cuticle oil kit
cards.desc: Air-dry dehydrator and acid-free primer prep nails for acrylics or gels, while natural cuticle oil moisturizes the nail area to reduce lifting and improve wear.

cards.title: 6-Piece Cuticle Oil Pens — Assorted Scents
cards.alt: Six cuticle oil pens in assorted floral scents
cards.desc: Set of six cuticle oil pens in natural scents hydrates skin around nails, softens rough cuticles, and adds healthy shine; compact design for easy daily use.

cards.title: Organic Nail & Cuticle Oil with Jojoba & Vit E
cards.alt: Organic nail and cuticle oil with jojoba and vitamin E
cards.desc: Organic cuticle oil nourishes, hydrates, and softens dry cuticles while supporting nail growth and strength; deep-conditioning formula helps repair damaged, brittle nails.

cards.title: GAOY Cuticle Care Kit — Oil & Remover, 20 ml
cards.alt: GAOY cuticle oil and remover 20 ml set
cards.desc: Two-piece kit includes cuticle remover gel and nourishing oil to soften, condition, and repair; ideal for thin nails and salon-quality results at home with a mild formula.

cards.title: Bliss Kiss Refillable Cuticle Oil Pen, 8 ml
cards.alt: Bliss Kiss refillable squeeze cuticle oil pen
cards.desc: Reusable squeeze pen prevents leaks and waste while delivering precise, mess-free hydration to cuticles; portable design keeps nails conditioned and manicures fresher longer.

cards.title: CND SolarOil & RescueRXx Cuticle Oil Pen
cards.alt: CND SolarOil and RescueRXx cuticle oil pen
cards.desc: On-the-go pen blends conditioning oils and keratin treatment to moisturize cuticles and support stronger nails; a travel-friendly duo for quick daily nail care.

cards.title: Bliss Kiss Fragrance-Free Cuticle Pens, 4-Pack
cards.alt: Bliss Kiss fragrance free cuticle oil pens 4 pack
cards.desc: Jojoba-rich, fragrance-free pens condition nails and cuticles to reduce brittleness; portable, mess-free applicators support healthy-looking growth and flexible strength.

cards.title: Sally Hansen Cuticle Rehab Oil Balm
cards.alt: Sally Hansen cuticle rehab oil balm tube
cards.desc: Vitamin E, aloe, and safflower oil nourish dry nails and soften rough cuticles; easy on-the-go balm conditions and helps restore hydration for healthier-looking hands.

cards.title: Bliss Kiss Lavender Vanilla Cuticle Oil Pen
cards.alt: Bliss Kiss lavender vanilla cuticle oil pen
cards.desc: Jojoba-enriched oil pen delivers precise, mess-free hydration to cuticles; softens skin, supports stronger nails, and leaves a light lavender vanilla scent on the go.

cards.title: JIASHENG Cuticle Oil with Real Flowers, Rose
cards.alt: JIASHENG rose cuticle oil infused with flowers
cards.desc: Flower-infused cuticle oil blends sunflower and sweet almond oils for quick-absorbing hydration that softens cracked cuticles and conditions nails with a soothing rose scent.

cards.title: Maccibelle Milk & Honey Cuticle Oil, 0.5 oz
cards.alt: Maccibelle milk and honey cuticle oil dropper
cards.desc: Light, fast-absorbing oil with honey aroma and vitamin E softens dry cuticles and strengthens nails; sanitary glass dropper helps avoid contamination during application.

cards.title: Maccibelle Cuticle Oil Refill, 4 oz — Pineapple
cards.alt: Maccibelle 4 ounce pineapple cuticle oil refill
cards.desc: Large refill size cuticle oil delivers moisturizing care to soften and condition dry cuticles; ideal for frequent users seeking long-lasting nail hydration and maintenance.

cards.title: Purely Northwest Toenail Fungus Solution, 1 oz
cards.alt: Purely Northwest toenail fungus solution bottle
cards.desc: Extra-strength natural formula with tea tree and oregano oils helps improve thick, discolored nails; brush applicator enables targeted, mess-free use on toes and fingers.

cards.title: Ellie Chase Vanilla Cuticle & Nail Oil, 2.3 oz
cards.alt: Ellie Chase vanilla nail and cuticle oil bottle
cards.desc: Blend of jojoba, aloe, and vitamin E penetrates to hydrate, repair, and strengthen dry cuticles and brittle nails; made in the USA, cruelty-free, and non-toxic.

cards.title: Bee Naturals Nail & Cuticle Oil, 0.5 oz
cards.alt: Bee Naturals nail and cuticle oil 0.5 ounce
cards.desc: Rich avocado and castor oils moisturize and protect nails and cuticles; travel-size bottle offers a light, refreshing scent and concentrated formula that goes a long way.

cards.title: Glamnetic 2-in-1 Cuticle Oil & Pusher Tool
cards.alt: Glamnetic 2 in 1 cuticle oil with pusher tool
cards.desc: Dual-action design pairs nourishing oil with an integrated cuticle pusher; hyaluronic acid and botanical oils condition overnight for refreshed cuticles and healthy nails.

cards.title: Onsen Tsubaki Cuticle Repair Oil, 10 ml
cards.alt: Onsen Secret cuticle repair oil with tsubaki
cards.desc: Dry oil formula features Tsubaki, tea tree, jojoba, and castor oils to strengthen nails and hydrate cuticles; quick-absorbing blend leaves a soft, non-greasy finish.

cards.title: Cuccio Milk & Honey Cuticle Oil, 8 oz
cards.alt: Cuccio milk and honey cuticle oil large bottle
cards.desc: Grease-free, spa-ready oil penetrates to hydrate and repair dry cuticles and hands; paraben-free, cruelty-free formula promotes stronger, shinier nails with overnight care.
